page.title: 12HEALTH AND THE FOOD WE EAT
page.content: {NATURAL FOOD.}In Wimboldsley most families grow food because we have large gardens.We grow beans, potatoes, carrots, cabbages, cauliflowers, beet root, lettuces, and spinach.We grow our own fruit including strawberries, rhubarb,raspberries, apples,tomatoes, blackcurrants,and tomatoes.We make pies and gateaux with them and store in our freezers. {ADDITIVES.}Beef crisps contain no real beef, just chemical flavouring.Two antioxidants stop the crisps going off they are numbered (E320)and(E321).At a local food factory RHM, gravy granules sauce mixes and salt are made. {DISEASES}can be connected with what we eat.This can effect heart and liver if we eat too much of some chemicals, fat or salt.We are not sure of this, so scientists today are trying to find out more about healthy eating.
